search_results.title: Exile - Patterson, Richard North: Books
search_results.snippet: In Exile, Patterson has redefined himself as a writer willing to take risks while seeking to understand one of the world's seemingly unsolvable problems.

search_results.title: About
search_results.snippet: In 2009 I handed off most of my clients, sold or gave away everything I owned that wouldn't fit into carry-on luggage, and started up my blog, Exile Lifestyle.
